lily_reflection.speaker: Narrator
lily_reflection.text: Several days have passed since the challenge. Lily sits at her usual table, but something has changed. Her notebook is closed, and she stares out the window with a contemplative expression.

lily_changed.speaker: Lily
lily_changed.text: *She notices you and gestures to the seat across from her* Sit. Please. I've been doing something I haven't done in years. Thinking. Really thinking.

lily_confession.speaker: Lily
lily_confession.text: That night... the 'accident' at my old restaurant... I added too much salt to the head chef's signature dish. The same mistake. And I ran.

lily_deeper.speaker: Lily
lily_deeper.text: I ran because I was certain it would be a disaster. But I never stayed to see. I never tasted. I never... gave myself a chance.

lily_reframe.speaker: Lily
lily_reframe.text: You showed me something. Imperfection isn't failure. It's... possibility. A recipe is a starting point, not a prison.

player_respond_acceptance.speaker: Narrator
player_respond_acceptance.text: What do you say to Lily?

choices.text: Every great chef develops their own style through happy accidents.
Your dragon thinks imperfection is what makes things interesting.
You're not the same chef who ran. You've grown.

lily_agrees.speaker: Lily
lily_agrees.text: *She nods slowly* I've read about legendary chefs who discovered their signatures through mistakes. I always thought they were just stories to comfort lesser cooks. I was wrong.

lily_dragon_wisdom.speaker: Lily
lily_dragon_wisdom.text: *She looks at your dragon and actually laughs* The creature who ruined my perfect dish teaching me about imperfection. There's poetry in that, I suppose.

lily_growth.speaker: Lily
lily_growth.text: *Her eyes glisten* I've spent years running from one failure. You're right. I'm not that frightened sous chef anymore. I'm... *she smiles* ...I'm someone who makes excellent accidental spice blends.

lily_thanks.speaker: Lily
lily_thanks.text: Thank you. Not just for the lesson, but for creating a kitchen where imperfection is allowed. Where food can be made with... what did you call it? Heart.

lily_future.speaker: Lily
lily_future.text: I want to cook again. Really cook. Not to prove anything, not for perfection, but... for the joy of it. Would you mind if I used your kitchen sometimes?
